trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration for the token issuance request.
trans-unit.target: 代表權杖發佈要求的設定。

trans-unit.source: The Scope class encapsulates information about the relying party (RP) associated with a security token request (RST).
trans-unit.target: 領域類別封裝信賴憑證者 (RP) 與安全性權杖要求 (RST) 相關聯的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This information is used by implementations of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService> class (STS) in the token issuance pipeline to return a response (RSTR) to a security token request (RST).
trans-unit.target: 這項資訊由實作<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService>類別 (STS) 權杖發行管線 (RSTR) 回應傳回給安全性權杖要求 (RST) 中的。</xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService>

trans-unit.source: Scope objects contain information about the address of the RP, the encrypting and signing credentials to be used with the issued security token, and whether the token itself or symmetric keys issued with the token should be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 物件決定領域包含位址的相關資訊的 RP、 加密和簽章憑證來搭配核發的安全性權杖，並使用簽發的權杖本身或對稱金鑰是否應該加密語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: By default, both the token and symmetric keys are encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會加密語彙基元和對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: You can extend the Scope class to carry additional information about the request, such as token types accepted by the RP, default token lifetime, maximum token lifetime, algorithm suites used by the RP, and so on; however, the information encapsulated in this class should not vary for individual requests.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擴充領域類別來執行要求，例如語彙基元類型 RP，接受預設權杖存留期、 最大的權杖存留期、 RP，等等; 所使用的演算法套件的其他資訊不過，這個類別所封裝的資訊應該不會個別要求的改變。

trans-unit.source: The token issuance pipeline is implemented in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A> method and this method invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A> method to get the configuration for the RST.
trans-unit.target: 權杖發行管線中實作<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A>方法，這個方法會叫用<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A>方法來取得 RST 的組態。</xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.Issue%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must implement a <xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A> method in your custom STS and return a Scope object appropriate for the RP and your STS implementation.
trans-unit.target: 您必須實作<xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A>中自訂 STS 和傳回範圍的物件適用於 RP 與 STS 實作的方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.SecurityTokenService.GetScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Scope"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Scope"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for the new <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope> instance.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的初始屬性值的新<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope>執行個體。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value.| |--------------|------------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.AppliesToAddress%2A>|`null` .| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.EncryptingCredentials%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.Properties%2A>|An empty dictionary.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.ReplyToAddress%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SigningCredentials%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SymmetricKeyEncryptionRequired%2A>|`true`.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.TokenEncryptionRequired%2A>|`true`.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值。 | |--------------|------------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.AppliesToAddress%2A>|`null` .| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.EncryptingCredentials%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.Properties%2A>|空的字典。 | |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.ReplyToAddress%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SigningCredentials%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SymmetricKeyEncryptionRequired%2A>|`true`.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.TokenEncryptionRequired%2A>|`true`.|</xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.TokenEncryptionRequired%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SymmetricKeyEncryptionRequired%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SigningCredentials%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.ReplyToAddress%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.Properties%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.EncryptingCredentials%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.AppliesToAddress%2A>

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Scope"></xref>指定的 appliesTo 位址的類別。

trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值。 | |--------------|------------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.AppliesToAddress%2A>|值`appliesToAddress`參數。 | |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.EncryptingCredentials%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.Properties%2A>|空的字典。 | |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.ReplyToAddress%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SigningCredentials%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SymmetricKeyEncryptionRequired%2A>|`true`.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.TokenEncryptionRequired%2A>|`true`.|</xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.TokenEncryptionRequired%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SymmetricKeyEncryptionRequired%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SigningCredentials%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.ReplyToAddress%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.Properties%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.EncryptingCredentials%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.AppliesToAddress%2A>

trans-unit.source: The appliesTo address of the relying party.
trans-unit.target: 信賴憑證者的合作對象 appliesTo 位址。

trans-unit.source: This is typically a URI.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是 URI。

trans-unit.source: The appliesTo address of the relying party.
trans-unit.target: 信賴憑證者的合作對象 appliesTo 位址。

trans-unit.source: This is typically a URI.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是 URI。

trans-unit.source: The signing credentials for the relying party.
trans-unit.target: 用於信賴憑證者的合作對象簽署的憑證。

trans-unit.source: The encrypting credentials for the relying party.
trans-unit.target: 信賴憑證者的合作對象加密認證。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the appliesTo address of the relying party.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定信賴憑證者的合作對象的 appliesTo 位址。

trans-unit.source: The appliesTo address of the relying party.
trans-unit.target: 信賴憑證者的合作對象 appliesTo 位址。

trans-unit.source: This is typically a URI.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encrypting credentials for the relying party.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定加密憑證的信賴憑證者的合作對象。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.TokenEncryptionRequired%2A> property is `true`, the credentials are used to encrypt issued security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.TokenEncryptionRequired%2A>屬性是`true`，認證會用來加密發出的安全性權杖。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.TokenEncryptionRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SymmetricKeyEncryptionRequired%2A> property is `true`, the credentials are used to encrypt symmetric keys issued with security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SymmetricKeyEncryptionRequired%2A>屬性是`true`，認證會用來加密對稱金鑰搭配安全性權杖中發出。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.SymmetricKeyEncryptionRequired%2A>

trans-unit.source: The encrypting credentials to be used for the relying party.
trans-unit.target: 要用於信賴憑證者的合作對象的加密認證。

trans-unit.source: Gets the properties bag to extend the object.
trans-unit.target: 取得擴充物件的屬性包。

trans-unit.source: The properties bag.
trans-unit.target: 在屬性包。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the replyTo address of the relying party.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定信賴憑證者的合作對象的 replyTo 地址。

trans-unit.source: The replyTo address of the relying party.
trans-unit.target: 信賴憑證者的合作對象的 replyto 地址。

trans-unit.source: This is typically a URI.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the signing credentials for the relying party.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定簽署憑證的信賴憑證者的合作對象。

trans-unit.source: The signing credentials to be used for the relying party.
trans-unit.target: 要用於信賴憑證者的合作對象簽署的認證。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether issued symmetric keys must be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值，指出是否必須加密已發行的對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: If the SymmetricKeyEncryptionRequired property is `true`, symmetric keys are encrypted using the credentials in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.EncryptingCredentials%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SymmetricKeyEncryptionRequired 屬性為`true`，使用中的認證加密的對稱金鑰<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.EncryptingCredentials%2A>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.EncryptingCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if symmetric keys must be encrypted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果必須加密的對稱金鑰。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether issued security tokens must be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值，指出發出的安全性權杖是否必須加密。

trans-unit.source: If the TokenEncryptionRequired property is `true`, security tokens are encrypted using the credentials in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.EncryptingCredentials%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果 TokenEncryptionRequired 屬性為`true`，使用中的認證加密的安全性語彙基元<xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.EncryptingCredentials%2A>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Scope.EncryptingCredentials%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if security tokens must be encrypted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果安全性權杖必須加密。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
